experience.description: Working on a wide range of projects with many different technologies and types of work. Some examples include: DevOps, code review, VBA scripts for Excel, python automation scripts, C#/Angular coding and Database management. This role also allowed me to improve my communication and organisation skills, being a fast pace environment with multiple project happening at once and some client facing work is involved.
Delivering a modern solution for city councils to manage their data, working accross the entire product, including SQL databases, C# backend, Angular frontend and Android development.
Help organize and maintain the shop by managing deliveries/returns and demonstrate good communication skills to provide a great customer experience
